      Defines a global authentication scheme that'll be used for all requests (if not overridden).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MockMvcAuthenticationScheme RestAssuredMockMvc.authentication(Object authentication)

      Authenticate using the given principal.

      static MockMvcAuthenticationScheme RestAssuredMockMvc.principalWithCredentials(Object principal, Object credentials, String... authorities)
